data.text: Uno awo ulonzi wa Sulemani.
Ugoli upatikana kwa gehile haufaya,
Mndewa Imulungu hawaleka wene haki wafe na nzala,
Unyeke ogala ukiwa,
Yeli na nzewele kolundiza hamoja kipindi cha kusenga,
Kumweda kokala kudipala da mwene haki,
Yeli na haki kokumbukigwa kwa ganogile,
Yeli na ubala mmoyo wake kobokela malagizo,
Munhu yotenda mbuli zigoloke kokala goya,
Yokonyeza kwa nzila ihile kogala madununzo,
Mulomo wa munhu yeli na haki nzasa ya ugima,
Kwiihila kogala ugomvi,
Mulomo wa munhu yotanga goya una ubala,
Weli na ubala okwika ngama ya kutanga vinhu,
Ugoli wa munhu, ayo ngome yake,
Nhunza ya munhu yeli na haki awo ugima,
Yotogola kuzumigwa kolongozela muugima,
Yomwihila munhu kinyelegezi mtapitapi,
Heli na mbuli nyingi hokuwa na gehile,
Mbuli za munhu yeli na haki kamba shaba inogile,
Mbuli za munhu yeli na haki zowafaya wengi,
Ganogile ga Mndewa Imulungu gago gogala ugoli,
Munhu mbozi kosang'hana gehile kamba mdawalo,
Choodumba munhu yotenda gehile acho chonda kimulawilile,
Vulavumbi dahabita domsegesa munhu yehile,
Kamba viili siki mgameno hebu yosi mgameso,
Kumdumba Mndewa Imulungu kokwengeza siku za kuwa mgima,
Tamanilo da munhu yeli na haki dogala deng'ho,
Mndewa Imulungu ayo ngome ya wanhu wang'alile,
Wanhu wene haki honda wasegesigwe mwiisi,
Mulomo wa munhu mwene haki olava mbuli za ubala,
Milomo ya wanhu wene haki yotanga mbuli zonda zitogoligwe,
